item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

Monday 05/06/2013 week's location is:

Aunt Chilada's (in Hamden)

Aunt Chilada's has been a past winner of the New Haven Advocate's reader vote for "best Mexican".  Plus a great view of the head of Sleeping Giant State Park.

http://www.auntchilada.com/

Plenty of free parking.

The Specials will run 6-9pm:

$2 for domestic draft beer

$4 house drinks

$1 off bottled beer & premium draft

$5 for house Margarita

appetizers are buy-one-get-one

there may be some free appetizers

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people.

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

HOST: Jason.  Cell # is 203-901-4957, calling or texting is fine

PARKING: Free

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Call/text the listed host. We're also probably among the largest groups at the bar
item.name: Happy Hour 5/6: Cinco de Mayo + 1 at Aunt Chilada's in Hamden
